壮観な自然。素晴らしい料理。文化の多様性。すばらしいサービス。: Spectacular nature. Exceptional cuisine. Cultural diversity. Excellent service.
ベトナムは、Covid-19の制限なしで国際観光を完全に再開しました。 今では、: Vietnam has fully reopened for international tourism without any Covid-19 restrictions. Now you are free to discover and enjoy various wild nature destinations like limestone mountains, green terraced rice fields, and white sandy beaches. Holiday is coming, let’s get away from it all.
新しいサイト、サウンド、フレーバーを取り入れてください。 本当に思い出に残る体験: Take in new sites, sounds, and flavors. Experiences that are truly memorable. Let’s explore, relax, and play. Live fully in Vietnam.
これらの実用的な記事で旅行の準備をしましょう: Prepare for your trip with these practical articles
インスタグラム で最高の #探検ーベトナム の瞬間をタグ付けしてください: Tag your best #ExploreVietnam moments on Instagram
カマウ水上マーケットはどこ？: Where is Ca Mau Floating Market?
カマウ水上マーケットは、カマウ市の中心部、8 区のガンハオ橋から約 200 メー: Ca Mau Floating Market is located at the edge of the Gang Hao River, about 200 meters from the Gang Hao Bridge in District 8, in the heart of Ca Mau City. The Ca Mau Floating Market is as busy as any other floating market in the West. There are hundreds of boats here, large and small, full of goods that can be exchanged and traded here. No one knows when this floating market existed, but it has long been a distinctive cultural feature, especially in Ca Mau and the Southern River region in general.
何を食べよう？: Where you can try local food?
カマウ水上マーケットでは、食品、日用品、果物から、トレーダー向けの新鮮な農産物や: Ca Mau Floating Market sells all kinds of goods, from food, daily necessities and fruits to wholesale purchases of fresh produce and garden vegetables for traders. If you have the chance, we would love to recommend you to visit this special market on the Guanghao River where the sunshine, the wind, the river, the simplicity and sincerity of the people here, mixed with the rich produce of the River Gardens, leave an indelible impression.
誰もが一度は訪れたくなる面白いところ: An interesting place that everyone wants to visit at least once
早朝からの取引活動美しい景色、多彩なグッズ人々は親切で正直で素朴: early morning trading activityBeautiful scenery, various goods People are kind, honest and naive
訪問者は一年中いつでもここに来ることができ、 どの市場でも、買い手と売り手は常に: Visitors can come here at any time of the year because buyers and sellers are always bustling in any market. Agricultural products and fruits are colorful even though they change with the seasons, making it an attractive place.
ファンシーパン（PHAN XI PANG）山はベトナムで一番高い山、「東の屋根」: PHAN XI PANG Mountain is the highest mountain in Vietnam and is known as the 'Eastern Rooftop’. Mount Fansipan is 3,143m above sea level and is centrally located. PHONG　THO to HOA　280km long to BINH, HOANG　LIEN　The widest part of the SON foothills is about 75km and the narrowest is about 45km, BACH MOC LUONG TU, PHAN XI PANG,PU As LUONG 's three adjacent mountain ranges, the giant roof holds many strange and most mysterious things, as well as a desire to conquer more.
ファンシーパンの登る最適な時期は10、11月に雨季が止んだばかり、冬もまだ来てい: The best time to climb Fansipan is in October or November, when the rainy season has just ended and winter has not yet arrived. It is also February and March, when spring has come and the rainy season has not yet arrived. At the end of March, if you're lucky, you might have a chance to see a rhododendron forest blooming in the picturesque sky. If possible, you should check the weather forecast a day or two before climbing.
二日に登るかロープウェイで６分に乗ってから20分〜30分登った後、ファンシーパン: Climb on the second day or take the ropeway for 6 minutes and climb for 20 to 30 minutes before arriving at Fansipan Lejan. Free to explore the bamboo garden, Bao'an Zen monastery, restaurants, malls and more.
ラオカイ省に属するサパ (またはサパ) は、ベトナム北西部に位置する同名の地区に: Belonging to Lao Cai province, Sapa (or Sapa) is a highland town in the homonymous district located in northwestern Vietnam. The town of Sapa is located at an altitude of about 1,500m to 1,800m above sea level, and the majority of the inhabitants are Kinh and ethnic minorities. Although the last few years have only ’raided’ social networks, Sapa has been rated by the French as a potential tourist destination since the 40s of the last century. Traces of the French elite of the past, such as power generation systems and more than 200 classic villas, are still visible, adding to the beauty of every corner of this mountain town. .
キッチン バッファローの肉はサパの特産品です。新鮮な水牛の肉をスパイスで丁寧にマ: Kitchen Buffalo meat is a specialty of Sapa. Fresh buffalo meat is carefully marinated in spices, then smoked in a wood-burning stove and dried to perfection. It should be steamed or boiled again and then drunk with water or chopped and squeezed a little more lemon zest. The mellow meat flavor, stimulating aroma, and sweet aftertaste are truly worthy of the name 'human beauty.'
海だけでなく、サパなどの高地でもトップクラスのサーモンが獲れます。サパサーモン（: Top-class salmon can be caught not only in the sea, but also in highlands such as Sapa. Sapa salmon (or fried salmon, rainbow trout) often live in cold waters, so the meat is tender, not too fatty, and has an eye-catching red-orange color. I want to eat the Sapa salmon hotpot once .
ワキ豚はモン族が自由に飼育している豚の品種で、小さいながらも非常に「むくみ」が強: Waki pigs are a breed of pigs that are freely raised by the Hmong people. A grown pig weighs only about 6 kg in the armpit. The pork is lean and fat alternately, and when grilled over charcoal, it has an indescribable deliciousness. Don't forget to drink apple cider when eating pork armpits. Make your pleasure more complete .
サパの町の中心部から西​​へ約 12km のところに、ライ チャウに向かう途中の: About 12km west of Sapa town center is Thac Bat , a famous scenic spot on the way to Lai Chau . The white waterfall that flows down from a height of 200m looks like it is spitting out smoke, and mixes with the sound of the wind to create a powerful sound. The clear stream that flows through O Cui Ho is created from this waterfall .
愛の滝は白銀の滝に比べてやや標高が低い (約 100m) だけですが、さまざまな: Ai -no-taki is slightly lower than Shirogane-no-taki (about 100m), but it attracts many tourists with its various adventure tourism activities. 'Experts' often come here to challenge their endurance with rope swing schedules. It is contraindicated for those who are afraid of heights or have weak physical strength.
遠くから見ると、愛の滝は雄大な山々に囲まれた巨大な帽子のように見えます. 滝は、: From a distance, Love Falls looks like a giant hat surrounded by majestic mountains. It is ideal for those who want to explore many of Sapa's attractions during the day. Don't forget to spend some time at the base of the falls to watch the golden streams glisten in the sun and admire the rich flora and fauna here.
サパの町の中心部から南東へ約8km進むと、少数民族の黒人モン族の居住地であるラオ: About 8 km southeast of Sapa town center , you will arrive at Lao Chai Village, home to the black Hmong ethnic minority. Nestled between mountains and forests, clusters of tile-roofed wooden houses perched precariously on a hillside facing a winding river - Ban Lao Chai is like a picture of a rustic village straight out of a painting.
ベイ マウ ココナッツ フォレストは、ホイアンの有名なエコツーリズム エリアです: Bay Mau Coconut Forest is a famous ecotourism area in Hoi An. When you come here, you can sit on a basket boat and visit a green coconut forest in the middle of a quiet space, watch basket dances, boat races, and enjoy local specialties.
ベイ マウ ココナッツ フォレストは、多くの観光客がホイアンの旅程で訪れる目的​: Bay Mau Coconut Forest is a destination that many tourists visit on their Hoi An itineraries. This place promises to bring you many new and interesting experiences. To complete your journey, quickly put together the following essentials before exploring this green coconut forest!
ベイ マウ ココナッツ フォレストは、ホイアン市から約 3 km の場所にあり、: Bay Mau Coconut Forest is located about 3 km from Hoi An City and is also known locally as Cam Thanh Coconut Forest. This is a famous eco-tourism area where visitors can experience many things about river nature, vast coconut forests and rustic basket boats.
レジスタンス戦争中、ココナッツの森は重要な革命基地であり、多くの敵の戦いに勝利す: During the Resistance Wars, the Coconut Forest was an important revolutionary base, helping to win many enemy battles. Today, taking advantage of the natural beauty of the vast coconut forest, this place has been developed to become a famous eco-tourism area and one of Hoi An's famous tourist destinations.
地元の人々によると、カム タン ココナッツの森は約 200 年前から存在していま: According to locals, the Cam Thanh Coconut Forest has been around for about 200 years. At that time, immigrants from the southwest region brought the nipa variety and planted it in the area. Thanks to the combination of water and soil, the trees gradually multiplied and developed into a large forest of about seven acres (7 hectares). That's where the name Bay Mau Coconut Forest comes from (now the Coconut Forest covers an area of up to 100 hectares).
ベイ マウ ココナッツ フォレスト エコ ツーリズム エリアでは、さまざまなサー: Bay Mau Coconut Forest Eco-Tourism Area offers a variety of services to provide visitors with unexpected and interesting experiences. It is an unforgettable feeling when many people come here .
緑のココナッツの木立をバスケット ボートに座って新鮮な空気を楽しむことは、多くの: Sitting on a basket boat through the green coconut groves and enjoying the fresh air is a unique experience loved by many. At the Bay Mau Coconut Forest tourist area, there are two types of basket boats, a small one for two people and a large one for four people. During your walks and sightseeing trips, you will hear fascinating stories about the palm forests and the melodies of distant Quang folk songs.
ウォーキングや観光のほか、かごや競艇などの迫力あるパフォーマンスも楽しめます。: In addition to walking and sightseeing, you can also enjoy powerful performances such as basket and boat races. Indeed, you will be amazed at the ability of the 'artist' to balance on a bobbin basket boat with smooth, very fast and impressive movements. The boat race performance is also thrilling to follow, and do n't forget the cheers and cheers that motivate the riders .
網を投げて魚を捕るというのは、ホイアンの椰子の森に来たら多くの人が期待する活気あ: Throwing nets to catch fish is a lively performance that many people expect when they come to Hoi An palm forest
素朴で独創的な漁師の姿をこの目で見ることができます。: You can see the simple and creative fishermen with your own eyes.
湾マウの椰子の森のツアー中に、時計、指輪、イナゴ、部族の帽子など、船頭から椰子の: During your tour of the Wan Mau Palm Forest, your boatman will give you palm leaf souvenirs, including watches, rings, locusts and tribal hats. The cuteness, enthusiasm, and naivety of the Quang people. The grandpa and aunt will also teach you how to make your own items.
緑のココナッツの森を眺めた後、自転車をレンタルして Cam Thanh 村を散策: After admiring the green coconut forest, rent a bike and explore Cam Thanh Village. A trip to immerse yourself in the beautiful and tranquil space of vast rice fields and breathe in the countryside air with the scent of ripe rice.
*地元の人々の家でホイアンの特産品を楽しむ*: *Enjoy Hoi An specialties in the homes of the locals*
ホイアンのココナッツの森を発見する旅では、この村で素朴な生活の最も本物の体験をす: On your journey to discover the coconut forests of Hoi An, do not hesitate to invite the locals to have the most authentic experience of rustic life in this village. Tasty dishes include spring rolls, sweet and sour shrimp salad, banana blossom salad, and central pancakes. You can also enjoy these delicious dishes at the Bay Mau Coconut Forest Restaurant.
